<rule id="springboot-properties-to-quarkus-00004" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="application{profile}.{extension}" pattern="spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=create-drop"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace Spring JPA Hiberate property with Quarkus property">
                    <message>
                        Replace `spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=create-drop` with `quarkus.hibernate-orm.database.generation=drop-and-create`
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/hibernate-orm" title="Quarkus Hibernate ORM and JPA Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
            <where param="profile">
                <matches pattern=".*"/>
            </where>
            <where param="extension">
                <matches pattern="(properties|yml|yaml)"/>
            </where>
        </rule>
